text: Our best path out of the COVID-19 pandemic is for everyone to get a vaccination as soon as it’s available to them. Join the fight by choosing to get fully vaccinated & encouraging the people in your life to do the same. #vaccine #COVID19 #CTVaxFacts @CTDPH https://t.co/AqVn14BHa9 https://t.co/WmCY4lU1My
